title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams
description: A practical and easy-to-follow course designed to help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
goal: Enable remote tech employees to effectively use Microsoft Teams for daily tasks such as communication, file sharing, meetings, and project management.
audience: Tech professionals working remotely who need to use Microsoft Teams as part of their daily tasks.

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to the features and layout of Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Setting Up Personal Profiles
sections.description: Guidance on setting up personal profiles and preferences in Teams.

sections.title: Chat and Messaging Features
sections.description: A detailed look at chat and messaging functionalities within Teams.

sections.title: Voice and Video Calls
sections.description: Exploring voice and video call features for effective communication.

sections.title: Sharing Files in Teams
sections.description: How to share files and collaborate on documents in real-time within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Using Channels for Organization
sections.description: Creating and managing channels for different projects or topics.

sections.title: Scheduling Meetings
sections.description: How to schedule, attend, and manage virtual meetings in Teams.

sections.title: Best Practices for Virtual Meetings
sections.description: Guidelines on running effective virtual meetings using Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Using Teams for Project Coordination
sections.description: How to use Teams for project management and task coordination.

sections.title: Collaboration Tools for Projects
sections.description: Exploring collaboration tools available in Teams for managing projects.

sections.title: Customizing Your Workspace
sections.description: Tips on customizing your workspace within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
sections.description: Guidance on troubleshooting common issues encountered when using Microsoft Teams.
